name: XDBS Corporation
overview:
XDBS is a great partner to work with. We have experienced better attendance with programs that we promote through them. Their team is always very agile and they also make recommendations that are helpful in making our programs more efficient.

XDBS Corporation is a Technology focused multi-channel demand generation & marketing company. XDBS provides services and solutions in the area of database, customer intelligence, content dissemination & syndication, event registration & traffic assurance, opportunity creation and other performance-based marketing services. It provides services to over 50 leading technology and marketing companies around the world with guaranteed results.
